dataset_id: BOREAS TF-01 SSA-OA Understory Flux, Meteorological, and Soil Temperature Data
title: BOREAS TF-01 SSA-OA Understory Flux, Meteorological, and Soil Temperature Data
summary: Energy, carbon dioxide, and momentum flux data collected under the canopy along with meteorological and soils data at the BOREAS SSA-OA site from mid-October to mid-November of 1993 and throughout all of 1994.
